title: Shopswired
description: A simple eCommerce platform for physical and digital products that allows sellers to build their shop quickly. Features includes unlimited variants, built in messaging system, risk scores, website embed and more.
Technologies: Google Cloud, VueJS, Go, Stripe Connect, SendGrid, TailwindCSS

title: State Bullion Depository
description: A government audited bullion management system with banking level security and transaction system including client portal, support system, and logistics administration.
Technologies: AWS, S3, VueJS, Python3, SendGrid, Bulma

title: Document Management System
description: A document management system for a car dealership systems provider with scanning solution, flexible search engine and metadata, with DMS third party integration.
Technologies: Google Cloud, VueJS, Go, SendGrid, TailwindCSS, C#, BigQuery

title: Passed Box
description: A client-side encrypted digital deposit box that sends keep-alive messages and automatically sends to your designated beneficiary.
Technologies: Google Cloud, VueJS/TypeScript, Go, Stripe, SendGrid, TailwindCSS
